Season Tropical Depressions Named Storms Hurricanes Category ≥ 2 Major hurricanes ( Category ≥ 3 ) Category ≥ 4 Category 5 1967 29 8 6 1968 14 8 5 0 0 0 0 1969 20 18 12 7 5 1970 19 10 5 0 0 1971 22 13 6 1972 19 7 0 0 0 1973 24 8 0 0 21 11 0 23 9 6 5 0 1976 23 10 6 0 0 1977 16 6 5 1978 24 12 5 0 1979 26 9 5 1980 15 11 9 5 1981 22 12 7 0 1982 9 6 0 7 0 0 1984 20 13 5 0 1985 14 11 7 0 1986 10 6 0 0 0 14 7 0 0 1988 19 12 5 1989 15 11 7 1990 16 14 8 0 0 1991 12 8 0 1992 10 7 1993 10 8 0 0 1994 12 7 0 0 0 1995 21 19 11 8 5 0 13 13 9 6 6 0 1997 9 8 0 0 1998 14 14 10 7 1999 16 12 8 8 5 5 0 2000 19 15 8 0 2001 17 15 9 5 0 2002 14 12 0 2003 21 16 7 16 15 9 7 6 2005 31 28 15 8 7 5 2006 10 10 5 0 0 2007 17 15 6 2008 17 16 8 6 5 0 2009 11 9 0 21 19 12 9 5 0 2011 20 19 7 0 2012 19 19 10 5 0 0 2013 15 14 0 0 0 0 2014 9 8 6 0 2015 12 11 0 2016 16 15 7 2017 18 17 10 8 6
